name: Leprechaun Pot of Gold Mayhem
description:
So you thought being a leprechaun was easy, huh? Well you just better watch out for those pots of gold!

Leprechaun Pot of Gold Mayhem is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages.

How long can you stay alive? Do have what it takes to guide your leprechaun to safety?

Features include:

* Beautiful, fun graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Smooth physics for nice gameplay
* Addictive gaming

Download right now!
